content: Property Asked by AnonymousAsked on 23 Feb 2019Is it legal for a PR to own an overseas property in JB after fulfilling MOP of buying HDB in SG?Stayed in the HDB for 20+ years in SG already, looking to own a house in JB for retirement next time. Need some advice :)1 answerAnswerBump0

Yixiong ChangLevel 5. GeniusAnswered on 24 Feb 2019you can buy private property whether locally or overseas. The requirement is just that you have to continue to be staying in the HDB. 0 comments0
